turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey! I need you to pick up a Starbucks coffee for me. I'm dragging over here.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course! What's the closest location to you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2 Atlantic Avenue, the one in the North End. It's my favorite one in Boston. You familiar with that one?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Absolutely! What's your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm carving an Iced Mocha, those are so delicious!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want sugar or cream in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Heck yes, I take 3 Splenda and a splash of almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That sounds yummy. What size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's Wednesday so make it a venti. Order it online too because it's such a busy location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good idea! I have your login info so it should be really easy. Do you want me to order it now or after your meeting?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Order it now because I could really use that coffee before my meeting.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Absolutely. I don't blame you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make sure it's a Iced Skinny Mocha! I forgot to mention that. I don't need the extra calories.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're ridiculous. The Skinny one is just as good though.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: This way I can get some whip cream on it too. Make sure you write just a little whip. I love whip cream so it'll be a nice treat.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I may wait until I get there because I don't want it to melt before I get it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's a really good idea. Thanks a ton! Let me know when you head out to get it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I sure will. I'm going to place the order after we get off the phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, you're the best!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No way. Just to be clear you want the Venti Iced Skinny Mocha with 3 Splenda and a splash of almond milk and a little whipped cream from the 2 Atlantic Avenue Boston, MA location near the North End, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You got it! Thanks again!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Your order is going to be ready shortly and the receipt is being sent to your cell phone via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
